title: Candice King & Steven Krueger Seem to Confirm Romance with a Kiss
text:
Getty Images â€œThe Vampire Diariesâ€ star Candice King, 36, and â€œThe Originalsâ€ actor Steven Krueger, 34, have tongues wagging after they shared a kiss on Instagram.
King included the PDA in a recap of 2023 , as she played out some of her most memorable moments from the past year, which included a smooch with Steven.
Instagram "I laughed. I cried. I laughed til I cried. I loved," she wrote in the caption. "Thanks for the dance 2023 ğŸ¥‚."
Fans were tickled by the news that King, who played Caroline Forbes in â€œThe Vampire Diaries,â€ and Krueger, who played Josh Rosza on the spin-off â€œThe Originals,â€ are an item!
Instagram One fan wrote, â€œCaroline and Josh were not on my 2023 bingo card but I'm here for it ğŸ˜â€ and another gushed, â€œYou were kissing Josh â€
Yet another fan called the romance â€œunexpected,â€ sharing, â€œI got butterflies.â€
King was previously married to the Fray guitarist Joe King for seven years. She filed for divorce in May 2022. The exes share two daughters.
